title: Akali Revert
body: That is the DUMBEST thing that could be done about this. Many champions have game breaking mechanics. If you wanna remove Akali's true stealth then you should also just remove all these other things to make the game easy. Things being Talon's ability to jump over walls, ASoul's ability to LITTERALLY fly across the map, Tahm's ability to grab an ally against their will and do anything with them, Evelynn's execution AND get away in one button press, Master Yi's stupidity to just have no cooldown on Q and R, Aatrox and Garen to just have "tons of damage" no matter how you build them, Neeko's ability to desguise as an ally and actually have an invisible ult, Anivia's egg, Zac's blob, Zilean's ult, Ekko's ult, and many more. THOSE ARE WHAT MAKES THEM UNIQUE. Akali will have NOTHING unique if you remove the true stealth. She will just be another bland champ with a couple dashes and throwing daggers and a little stealth. I'm no Akali main, I barely touch her but I however verse her in lane often and do find frustration versing her BUT THAT'S PART OF THE GAME. Just cuz you have issues with something, doesn't mean it has to be changed. Adapt to it, find a way to make do with what you're given. Avoid Akali. This is a team game and you're giving 4 other people to help you for the next 15+ minutes. No one has to take things on alone. And the ONLY reason Akali mains like Professor Akali wants her reverted is for selfish reasons "I want people to stop banning her so I can play her again". They have no issues with the ability itself. These kids need to stop crying about an ablity AND JUST LEARN HOW TO PLAY AGAINST IT. If they decide to quit the game, by all means please do because we don't need that in this game. Tired of people crying "its broke, fix it". How 'bout you get good and do something about it yourself. Massive rant but TL:DR, its POINTLESS to remove something that makes a champion unique only because people wanna cry about it.

replies.body:
use skill shots, hit the skill shots. she takes damage like a piece of paper. Either that or dont run around by yourself and die. There are plenty of character who do dumber shit than Akali yet she gets nerfed because its new and people can't help but complain about how bad they are.

So many low skill players complaining about a champion with the lowest win rate so much that Riot actually nerfed her.

Fucking incredible.
Actually using win rate as an argument when it goes to show how terrible the design is. bitch could be at 10% WR and still be an annoying champ to play against, your point makes no sense.

I think its a brilliant design. It adds to the game a new way to actually deal with someone. The problem lies with people unable to think for themseleves so they subject to crying to remove it. Theres counter play to Akali but i dont feel like repeating myself for the billionth time so please read the rest of my comments. Stay mad. You wouldnt be here if you werent mad about how right i was. ^.*
They should remove the fucking true stealth or just make the control wards be fucking useful like they were before.
No reason to. Play around it or just dont play the game. The ability is fine the way it is

I dont even ban akali because she is easy to lane against but this doesn't change the fact the her bullshit "defensive ability" is a pure mistake.
EVERYONE with a working brain hates her true stealth.

Get your shoes on junior, you have school soon.
Not even {{champion:107}} 's FUCKING ULT reveals her. What part of that sounds balanced to you? Oh, and for what it's worth it's on a BASIC ability, it's not even an ultimate.

Oh cool thats an interesting interaction. Man did you figure that out for yourself? Play the matchup often for yourself? Good THATS HOW YOU LEARN COUNTER PLAY. Do it a couple more times youll pick up some things. Like heres a little inside tip from a Leona main FUCKING UUUUUUUP Morgana supp. So youre leona and you wanna get on dat adc right? Give a good couple stuns right? Shes gonna black shield him right? Cool dont go on him. Just grab her with E, shes gonna drop it on herself. Yea so step on over to the adc and kill him. Oh ok so a couple encounters go by and she learns? Good for her but that bitch is now dead tho... and maybe him too. Mind games. Thats all the games about. LEARN TO USE IT AGAINST AKALI.... NEI... LEARN TO USE IT IN THE GAME IN GENERAL. Learned  to play against my counter BY STAYING THE FUCK OFF FORUMS AND OFF REDDIT. I ACTUALLY DID THINGS THE RIGHT WAY... YA KNOW PLAYING THE MOTHER FUCKING GAME. Theres counter play... learn it.

There's counterplay when Akali W outlasts Rengar's rank 1 ultimate (when he actually gets into jump range)? 

Nice meme.

I'm not an akali main but i liked to play her.

I really don't understand why people hate playing against her.
I just pick a champion like orianna or lux and pretty much win the lane.

Not to mention that her damage is so delayed that its entirely possible to die without even doing your second dash part of the ult.

Karthus deals x5 more damage with his ult than akali can ever hope to deal with her ult.

I never seen an akali hard carry any of my games up to plat 3. Idk what happens to diamond.
hello my brother

Most of those aren't nearly as gamebreaking as you may think though. Before ASol could fly across the map we had TF who could literally teleport there faster with a targeted stun, and TF has not been a problem for many years now. Talon gained his insane mobility over walls at the cost of being rather immobile (for an assassin at least) in other situation such as in the middle of a lane. 

On a side note I'm not saying Akali needs her true stealth removed. But it's good that Riot is looking at her shroud mostly for adding counterplay, since she's so frustrating to face because of that thing.
Nah, not all are game breaking. BUT ITS WHAT MAKES THEM UNIQUE, cool, fun

IF they remove her true stealth, they will have to buff her damage, so than people will complain about her doing to much damage, if they nerf her damage, they will have to buff her range, than people will complain about her having to much range, if they nerf her range, they will buff her utility and cool downs, than people will complain about her utility and cool downs, than they nerf that and buff her damage again, so than people will complain about her doing to much damage, if they nerf her damage they will buff her range, than people will complain about her having to much range......

> Tahm's ability to grab an ally against their will and do anything with them

Please no, we can't lose the memes...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BQ5LXCMwZP0

Akali removes the right click. An important mechanic that several champions rely on.

Akali jukes turret aggro too much. An important defense punishment mechanic.

Akali for being unique, should not equal non-counterplay. Counterplay is a crucial part of a competitive oriented game.

There should be better ideas than True Stealth justt waiting to be discovered and that do not violate the reasons above.

Have a nice day.

There is counter play. Akali is an assassin. They THRIVE on getting their prey alone. How does one counter being alone? By having their TEAM with them IN A TEAM game. Can't die to someone that's dead. *ahem*... Karthas, Sion and Teemo excluded.

she can only use it twice  (if not procing passive or using W) before she runs out of energy and she only heals with it if she has full energy or close to full energy

Hahaha. I like this. Sounds simple but if you use ur brain.... PUNISH HER FARMING. Idk i thought i caught on.

I mean who said he had to camp the lanes. I mean unless thats what YOU personally need yourself. All you need is enough to propel yourself into a self sustainable state. And any champion can get that given the right player behind the keyboard. Its not a complicated thing to do.

Her W as it is offers no counter play. 

You can be a little child and pretend that it doesn't matter if you'd like, but that's how this game is balanced.

Actually theres a flaw in your knowledge of the game right there. Team play is good for countering assassins. They want to get their prey alone and pop them off. But if you work with your TEAM on a TEAM based game then you can drop a phat stun on that Akali and kill her off before she can touch your squshies. COUNTER PLAYED.

Nah, fuck her True Stealth. There needs to be some sort of counter play for champions that have literally 0 AOE.
As I have stated several times before, the counter play to an assassin is simply don't play a TEAM GAME alone. Simply just have teammates nearby to help out.
Have you watched TF Blade play Akali? He'll legit 1v3 with her level 6.

First of all, I really doubt that, I would love to see him do that :/

Second of all, TF Blade has spent hundreds of hours learning and mastering the champion and is rated one of the best akali's out there, with all that time and practice put into the champion he should do good, just how the game is. He's learned all the mechanics of akali, knows her damage, which is why he succeeds when playing him. One tricks generally do well because they're good at their champion, not typically because that champion is broken.
